elements.title: film appearance of Captain America (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that a 1944 serial film (poster pictured) was the first film appearance of Captain America and the first film appearance of any Marvel Comics character?

elements.title: ten Royal Navy flag officers to die during the First World War (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that of the ten Royal Navy flag officers to die during the First World War, three were killed in action?

elements.title: Henry R. Pattengill (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Henry R. Pattengill requested that his name be removed from the ballot?

elements.title: zinc white (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that zinc white was found in several versions of The Scream?

elements.title: P. Kodanda Rao (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Indian independence activist and author P. Kodanda Rao's correspondence with Mahatma Gandhi helped to clarify Thoreau's influence on Gandhi?

elements.title: Steele's Greenville expedition (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that some historians believe that Steele's Greenville expedition marked a shift in the Union's war policy?

elements.title: Ipik Gandamana (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that after his tenure ended in 1964, Ipik Gandamana would be the last Indonesian minister of home affairs to be a civilian until 2009?

elements.title: founded cities not named after himself (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Alexander the Great occasionally founded cities not named after himself?
